code: public boolean isValidate() {     // defaults to true if not configured     return validate != null ? validate : true. }

comment: /**  * Whether to validate the HL7 message  * <p/>  * Is by default true.  */
code: /**  * Whether to validate the HL7 message  * <p/>  * Is by default true.  */ public void setValidate(Boolean validate) {     this.validate = validate. }

comment: /**  * To use a custom HL7 parser  */
code: /**  * To use a custom HL7 parser  */ public void setParser(Object parser) {     this.parser = parser. }

@Override protected void configureDataFormat(DataFormat dataFormat, CamelContext camelContext) {     if (getParser() != null) {         setProperty(camelContext, dataFormat, "parser", getParser()).     }     setProperty(camelContext, dataFormat, "validate", isValidate()). }
